title: Ord. pertaining to Grand Center Redevelopment area

abstracts.abstract: An Ordinance amending Ordinance Numbers 65857 and 66431 and 67059 and 68429 and  68532 and 68533 pertaining to the Grand Center Redevelopment Area approving a Tax Increment Financing Redevelopment Agreement for the Grand Center Redevelopment Area; approving a fifth Amendment to the Redevelopment Agreement contained in Exhibit A to such Ordinances; prescribing other matters and making findings with respect thereto; authorizing certain actions by City officials; and containing a severability clause and an emergency clause.
